raw_output:
system
You are a helpful AI for medical imaging.
user
System:
You are extracting factual relations from a medical imaging lecture. Use only information grounded in the input SLIDE_TEXT.

User:
SLIDE_TEXT:
The leading researchers in this field have developed a very large PET detector known as a whole body PET. By making the detector long enough to cover the entire body, the sensitivity is dramatically increased, allowing for even greater sensitivity than conventional PET systems. 

With this approach, you can obtain a much more sensitive and comprehensive view of the entire body in a single scan. This technology offers the opportunity to capture detailed, global images of tracer distribution, potentially improving diagnostic capabilities and expanding what can be studied. It's a very interesting and innovative idea that's advancing the field of molecular imaging.

STRICT INSTRUCTIONS:
- Return JSON only. No prose, no markdown, no code fences.
- Output a triple only if both subject and object appear verbatim in SLIDE_TEXT (case-insensitive).
- Predicates must be one of: uses | via | represents | depends_on | measures | produces | reconstructs_with.
- Add modalities ["text"] by default; add "image" only if clearly visible without the text.
- Confidence in [0,1].

OUTPUT:
{
  "triples": [
    {"s":"<verbatim subject>", "p":"uses|via|represents|depends_on|measures|produces|reconstructs_with",
     "o":"<verbatim object>", "modalities":["text","image"], "confidence":0.0, "evidence":"<short quote from SLIDE_TEXT>"}
  ]
}

assistant
{
  "triples": [
    {
      "s": "whole body PET",
      "p": "produces",
      "o": "a much more sensitive and comprehensive view of the entire body in a single scan",
      "modalities": [
        "text",
        "image"
      ],
      "confidence": 0.9,
      "evidence": "With this approach, you can obtain a much more sensitive and comprehensive view of the entire body in a single scan."
    },
    {
      "s": "whole body PET",
      "p": "measures",
      "o": "tracer distribution",
      "modalities": [
        "text",
        "image"
      ],
      "confidence": 0.8,
      "evidence": "This technology offers the opportunity to capture detailed, global images of tracer distribution"
    }
  ]
}

triples.o: a much more sensitive and comprehensive view of the entire body in a single scan
triples.evidence: With this approach, you can obtain a much more sensitive and comprehensive view of the entire body in a single scan.
This technology offers the opportunity to capture detailed, global images of tracer distribution
